cptrst: run basedline, checkpoint, and restart sims

db: sqlite database file to be created or updated
nodeclamp: distribute threads evenly across a fixed number of specified nodes
noprompt: do not prompt user to confirm launching jobs
norun: print job commands but do not run them
slurm: launch slurm jobs instead of using local mpirun

minData: minimum number of dwords transmitted per link
maxData: maximum number of dwords transmitted per link
clocks: number of clocks to run sim
minDelay: min number of clocks between transmissions
maxDelay: max number of clocks between transmissions

parameter_sweeps.name: weak_scaling
parameter_sweeps.desc: Maintain the number of components proportional to the number of ranks plus threads

parameter_sweeps.name: size_rank_perm
parameter_sweeps.desc: Permute comp size and ranks for a fixed number of components

parameter_sweeps.name: delay_rank_perm
parameter_sweeps.desc: Permute comp link delay and ranks for a fixed number of components
